text: Die Gewehre der Frau Carrar was a 1953 East German live television production of the play Señora Carrar's Rifles by Bertolt Brecht. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1953 television plays Category:East German films Category:East German television Category:German television films Category:German-language films Category:German-language television shows Category:Films based on works by Bertolt Brecht
title: Die Gewehre der Frau Carrar
